summary: Adds a waterwalking enchantment for boots and some enchanted boots.
descriptionHtml:
Currently adds 3 boots to the world. Hide boots, iron boots and shoes. All enchanted with \"Waterwalking\". Requires Enchanting skill of 25+ if you want to put it on other boots, yes boots only. 

Every set has been added to leveled lists. Everyone thats sells enchanted gear, could have one. The chance is rather small though, but i have seen the shoes. Since it is enchanted gear, it will only show up around level 10 and up. The shoes will show up around level 8. See the hint file if you want some right away. 

Currently only bandits and hunters might be using these boots. Maybe later the stormcloaks and imperials soldiers too.

v1.1 - Lowered spawn rates of all boots. (Raised levels of appearing in leveled lists from 1 to 6.) Removed enchanted boots from bandit lists. - Bandit bosses might have enchanted boots. - Hunters might have enchanted boots.
v1.0 - Initial release
author: EzDC
